text: He ’ s back! Justin Bieber made his first public appearance since canceling the remaining 14 shows of his Purpose world tour in July. The “ Sorry ” singer, 23, enjoyed a night out on Thursday, August 3, at the launch party for celebrity stylist Karla Welch ’ s Bieber - inspired collection with Hanes. The Grammy winner, who sported clear glasses and a small black backpack, was all smiles as he posed for photos with fans outside the event, held at Maxfield in West Hollywood. Bieber socialized with his manager Scooter Braun and Braun ’ s wife, Yael Cohen, throughout the evening, and also took a moment to admire a large photo of himself on the wall.
